function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher cost and massive power consumption of sensor nodes","Impact":"Inefficient IAQ monitoring, reduced system lifetime","Mitigation":"Develop low-power sensor nodes, implement sleep mode for inactive nodes","Technologies":"Low-power sensor technologies, sleep mode activation, energy-efficient designs","People":"Researchers, system developers, sensor manufacturers","Owner":"System developers, sensor manufacturers"},{"Description":"Sensor calibration as a challenge for accurate real-time monitoring","Impact":"Inaccurate IAQ data, unreliable monitoring","Mitigation":"Develop advanced calibration techniques, use high-quality micro gas sensors","Technologies":"Advanced calibration methods, high-quality micro gas sensors","People":"Researchers, sensor manufacturers","Owner":"Researchers, sensor manufacturers"},{"Description":"Reliance on resistive heating sensors leading to energy consumption","Impact":"Reduced network lifetime, inefficient energy usage","Mitigation":"Implement sleep mode for inactive nodes, develop energy-efficient sensor designs","Technologies":"Energy-efficient sensor designs, sleep mode activation","People":"System developers, sensor manufacturers","Owner":"System developers, sensor manufacturers"}]}
